He called sometime ago and said he wouldn't be around for a few days due to training. I hope he's okay. Iris I hate to treat people terribly, really, but it was for my grade. Can't have bad grades can I? I walk out of first period and on to the next. I turn the corner and I stumble into someone. "Ah, the myth, the legend, Iris gooding." Nina says leaning against the door frame. I roll my eyes and dust my skirt off, pushing past her with a shoulder bump. "See you at 5!" She yells from the door and I feel my stomach twist. That's today? This is some big shit she wants me to help with and I can't get in more trouble considering the fact that I'm already fucking the principal. I'd rather go under for this that people know that though. "Iris gooding." The teacher calls out and I turn my head to her. "Here?" I question, thinking she's taking the roll but she just shakes her head. "The Principal wants you in his office, take your things with you." She says making my brows furrow. I grab my things and head for the door, walking out of it and down the hall. What does he want now? When I finally make it downstairs to the front office I see Hermes waiting for me. Outside his office. "Why am i out of class?" I question him impatiently but he just rolls his eyes and pulls me into his office. See what people don't understand about Hermes is that he's really a great guy and he's only just turned 25 a few days ago. His father ran the school but it was passed down to him when Hermes grew bored of being over it, he figured his son would be a good match for the school considering he was just like him but what he didn't know what his son would fall in love with a 16 year old when he first started this job a year ago. Before you judge me, don't. The bell rings as I'm tucking my shirt back into my skirt and pulling on my coat. Hermes comes up and hugs me from behind. "You seem upset about something. What's wrong my love?" He asks me, making me sigh heavily. "Can I have your advice on something?" I ask, craning my head to look at him. He turns me around to where I'm facing him and leans down to press his forehead to mine. "You can always ask me for anything." He says and i go quiet for a moment thinking of ways to say this without actually saying it. "I'm doing something really big soon and I don't know how it will end but what I do know is I'm nervous as hell." I say shakily. He rubs my arms and steps back from me. "Look at me." He says making me snap my eyes up at him. "What you are is amazing, you're the smartest person I know and no matter what happens you will come out on top, every. Single. Time." He says and a tear fall down my cheek slowly. He wipes my face with the pad of his thumb and pecks me on the lips. "Chin up mama. I'll call you later." He says turning me around and pushing me out the door with a smack on the butt. Two periods down...five more to go. ~After school~ At the end of the day I met Nina by her car, or her moms car rather, and got in. We sit there for awhile in silence before Nina puts the key in the ignition, but doesn't turn it. Instead she looks at me with a serious face. "I'm glad you came. I really needed help with this and it was too much for just me. I'll make sure that you don't go down for anything if shit hits the fan. I promise." She says and sticks out her pinky to me. At this moment I knew she was serious and not just using me to get what she needed done. Using me and throwing me under the bus. Nina never broke promises, big nor small. I stare at her for a moment, and finally loop her pinky within mine, sealing the promise. I hope this shit goes smoothly. She pulls the car backwards out of its parking spot and out of the school, blasting Pink + White. I stare out the window and turn the outside world into my personal movie as it whips by. Thin and thick trees all carrying similar colored leaves. The world blowing a cool wind throughout said leaves as if they were dandelions. The wish being that everything would fall one day. Just so the world has a moment to relax, before it has to change for everyone while still no one is pleased. No one is ever happy, so why keep spinning, why keep turning, for people that don't deserve me. Why keep spinning? Nina I peak over every once and awhile at Iris. She stares outside the window solemnly, drawing small patterns on the window with her finger. I pull into the warehouse parking lot and shut off the car. I take a deep breath and get out, Iris following. I open the warehouse doors and lock them once Iris steps inside. "The layout of the plan is over the on the wall and table. Critique it and tell me what to change, this has to be damn near perfect. I only have one other option." I tell her making her look back at me skeptically. She eyes over the plans for awhile and turns to me when she gets to the end. "And you think this will actually work?" She says eyeing me. "It has to. I'd hate to resort to the second option." I say and she shrugs. "Where do we start?" Hi, the photo up top is Principal Hermes. I didn't put him in the new characters because he wouldn't be mentioned often but I figured you should know what most of the characters look like in my head. *The song for this chapter is 'Love of my life' by Harry Styles* Andreas "L-I-O-N-S, Lions go go go!" My head is pounding. I look over and see my dad cheering for me and my father, of course, judging my every move. I look down and see my restless reflection through the polished clip of the clipboard. Dark circles and red eyes with pale skin. I throw my towel down and jog to stand where the referee is with the ball. He passes me the ball, to which I throw in to Marcus. I run towards the back while he points to everyone else, giving them signals to pass me the ball. Marcus passes the ball to AJ to which he was supposed to give to me but instead he steps back and goes for a three pointer from the corner. Before he pulls for the three, he looks at me and winks, He thinks he'll make it but he's standing too far in the corner, meaning he'll miss. AJ lets the ball go and everyone jumps in front of him in order to get it. I run through a hole between the players and get ready. The ball flies and hits the rim and bounces off, but I'm already here. I jump up and grab the ball, dunking it past the rim. Screams and cheers sound as I land on the ground and take off towards the other side to defend. 30 seconds left on the clock. The other team passes the ball around us until the clock is at 10 seconds. The other team goes to pass the ball again and I catch their signal. I run through to swipe the ball and break up the pass. I get the ball and see 4 seconds on the clock. Angel flashes through my mind, what happened to him, and who did it. My body heats up with anger and pain. I let it take over me and step back with the ball in one hand, then launch it forward, letting it go. The ball soars through the air and connects with the glass, shattering it, and going into the net with a sharp swish. The buzzes sounds and the lights flicker as people shout and rush the court. I feel slaps and pats on my back as I go to exit the court. "Good game." I say to myself mockingly. I'm almost to the locker room when I hear someone call my name. At first I ignore it and keep walking but they call again, making me whip my head around with aggravation. My face softens when my eyes land on Sea. He jogs over and jumps into my arms. I swing him back and forth and eventually put him down. He clears his throat and scratches the back of his head. "Hey." He says awkwardly making me smile for the first time today. He's so cute. "Hey, you wanna come over tonight?" I ask him and he thinks for a second. "Won't your parents be home? I'm sure you know I'm not too fond of you father." He says and I nod, "Me either. No, they won't be home, they're leaving tonight for some trip with the other Greeks." I say and he face palms himself. "That's right my dad is going to that too. Well, I guess I'll get some clothes and come over." He says and I do a small celebratory shimmy. "Wait here I'll be out soon." I tell him and walk into the locker room. While I'm walking in AJ storms past me, bumping my shoulder. I almost turned around but I drop it and keep moving towards the locker room. He's been acting weird but I won't make it a bigger deal than what it might be. Once I'm dressed and out of the locker room, I walk out and up to Sea. "Ready to go?" I say to which he says yes and we walk out of the gym and to the car. Or at least we were going to until we were stopped...by my dad. "My baby, my son, what a great game!" He says engulfing me into a hug and swinging me around. "Daaad." I groan partly because I couldn't breathe and the other because I know Sea is watching. He places me down and pinches my cheek. "Who might you be?" He asks looking down at Sea, making his eyes damn near pop out of his head. I lean down and whisper in his ear that this is dad aka the nice one and not the son of a bitch that's sitting in the car and should be rotting somewhere instead. He stifles his laughter with his hand and clears his throat. "Hi, My name is Sea, son of Thanatos and Bellona." He says and sticks his hand out to my dad. I rub his shoulder with a smile on my face and look at my dad. He seems pleased. "Very nice to meet you, will your father be joining us tonight, we have been looking forward to getting everyone together for the trip, and it wouldn't be a party without him." Dad says after giving Seas hand a firm shake but not letting go. "Yes sir, he should be leaving soon actually." Sea says and Dad smiles, letting his hand go. "That's wonderful, Andreas what are your plans for tonight son." He asks and I rub the back of my head. "Sea and I were actually going to have a sleepover at the house tonight if that's fine." I tell him avoiding eye contact. When nothing is said I turn and look at him. His eyes are looking between me and Sea. "No bodily fluids on the couches young man." He says and I groan again. "Ok dad, see you next week, love you, bye." I shout while pulling away a very flush faced Sea. I practically throw my things in the car and speed off once Sea is comfortable. "Don't mind my dad. Sometimes he says more that he needs to or should."I chuckle. "I'm just glad he's nice." Sea says and relaxes into the seat. Sea lives walking distance from the school so we get to his house rather quickly. We pull into his driveway and he gets out. "I'll be right back." He says and closes the door. I watch him as he jogs up the driveway and to the steps, going in the house. I sit back and reflect on what all happened this week. Practice was pretty harsh, as always. Speed drills and shooting drills on top of working out as well as doing the work that was sent home from school. I painfully read the rest of Angel's journal. That was enough to keep me up every night. My chest hurt and my stomach turning with disgust. I just don't understand. I'll take care of this, I don't care how high and mighty he is, I don't care if he's my grandfather. Tonight however, I get to see Sea. The one thing and person that keeps me afloat in this world. Speaking of Sea, he runs out the house with a small duffel bag draping over his shoulder. He opens the door and plops down in the seat with a huff. "Ready." He says looking at me. I put the car in reverse and back out the driveway, pulling off once in the road. No pov They drive down the dark road together. The only lights on the street being the high beams from the car. They speed down the road, twisting and turning, passing bare trees that reach out upon each other. They don't speak to one another, silently taking in the scenery. Every once and awhile they glance toward each other. Eventually they pull into Andreas's driveway and get out the car. "I'll never get used to how nice this house is." Sea says when they walk inside. Andreas chuckles in response. "You want to camp out down here tonight?" Andreas asks Sea, sitting down and sinking into the couch. "Well since you already made yourself comfortable, I guess we'll stay." Sea says laughing and throwing a pillow over to Andreas, to which he let hit him in the face. They pull out most of the snacks from the cabinets and are now searching for a movie. "Our choices are..Rio, Happy feet Two, or My Policeman." Andreas says with the remote in his hand. "Since when were you the movie choice guy?" Sea says looking at Andreas with narrow eyes. "When I picked up the remote." Andreas says blowing a kiss. Sea throws another pillow. They end up watching My Policeman, laying their heads on the arms of the couch with their legs tangled together in the middle, not thinking much of it. They watch as Tom touches Patrick. Andreas takes one of his arms from behind his head and gently touches Sea. His finger tips move slowly over the small patch of smooth skin that's exposed at the bottom of his Jean clad legs. Sea notices this but he stays still in fear that if he moves then it'll all go away. All too soon. Something surges throughout Andreas and he sits up. "What's wrong?" Sea says sitting up as well and grabbing onto Andreas's shoulder. He looks over to the hand that holds him. Pale, smooth hands that could kill, but choose not to. He grabs Sea's hand and slowly pulls it to his lips. He gives his hand short and sweet kisses, never breaking eye contact. Their hearts are racing and the air is getting thicker with tension. Sea lets go of Andreas's hand to hold both side of his face. They lean into each other slowly until their lips connect. The passion finally being released, the pain of not having it sooner, the excitement of a new feeling and the fear of letting it go. They pull apart and Andreas lifts Sea onto his lap. They continue their kiss. Arms wrapped around each other tightly. Andreas stands up still holding Sea. To which he complained and said he could walk but never got through to Andreas. They walk up the spiral staircase and into the bedroom. Andreas places Sea on the bed and gets in between his legs. "Toso omorfo" Andreas says looking over Sea. Arms above his head, his hair slightly disheveled, his long sleeve shirt coming up slightly, revealing the skin underneath, small pants coming past his lips. Andreas leans down and connects his lips to Sea's forehead and from there he travels down, peppering a trail of kisses down Sea's body and telling him how beautiful he is. Sea holds his arms out to Andreas to which he lies in between. "You don't know how long I've waited to feel this whole again. Waited for someone to see me for what I am and still be okay with who I am." Andreas says and lets out a heavy breath. "What are you?" Sea asks him. Andreas and Sea make eye contact. "I'm broken." He says in a hushed tone, his voice breaking. Everything that's hurt him and been taken from him is setting in on him all at once. Sea holds Andreas closer, rubbing small circles on his back. "I believe in you. You've come far and you can go the rest of the way. You'll overcome all your obstacles and end up on top and now you don't have to do it alone." Sea says to Andreas who looks up at him with tears slowly sliding down his face. It breaks Sea's heart. "Are you sure?" Andreas asks and Sea nods, leaning in and pressing a kiss to Andreas's forehead. Sea wipes away the tears and they lie in silence for awhile. "Are we going out now?" Sea asks Andreas and he chuckles. "I don't know, will you go out with me?" Andreas says back, smiling. "You'll do." Sea says making them both laugh. The silence falls back over the room and Andreas thinks back to Angel. He has to tell someone about this. "Sea?" Andreas questions to which he gets a half sleep 'yeah'. "I have to tell you something...it's about Angel."
sentences: Hi, welcome to my new book 'Anchor' the book of Sea and Drowning.
Here is a list of the main characters!
Characters: Sea / 17 yrs / abilities: With a touch, Bring forth the worse thoughts or memories of a person that leads them to attempt suicide / Father:
Thanatos Andreas / 18 yrs / abilities: Strength, speed and power beyond any human, god, or animal /
Father&Father: Kratos + Hercules Elara / 17 yrs / abilities: The ability to grow any vegetation or fruit as well as causing chaos to anyone she desires / Mother&Father:

Dinlas + Antheia Nina / 18 yrs / abilities: Healer of all things including wounds, deformities and chronic pains as well as bringer of light/ Mother&Mother: Iaso + Theia Cassian / 19 yrs / abilities: beauty and fire as well as the creation of love and life / Mother&Father:
Aphrodite + Hephaestus New/more characters will be added later on.
I hope you enjoy reading this and at anytime let me know what I can improve on Ps.

This book began on Wattpad and my characters will look different as well as certain things like songs that can be played while reading but I will just insert at the top what song you should listen to/ goes with that chapter.
Sea I think...I'm flying?
I can't hear anything, but I feel the air coming through my clothes, nipping and biting at my pale skin.
Should I open my eyes?
Do I deserve to see what alluring sight awaits me?
Dare I spot the clouds of silk that help the sky sing the most beautiful song?
I'll do it..
On the count of three.. One... Two... Three!
I open my eyes.
I see blue, but not the one that is littered with thick marshmallow clouds that cover that damned sun, No.
This blue waved at me, inviting me in to hear it's sad story of how everything ends for me.
I see now that I was never flying...but falling.
A muted scream pushes past my lips and I plunge into the water.
It gathers it's hands around my throat and holds onto me, the creatures taunt me, the world is laughing at me.
"How unpleasant, How ironic, Sea, the deadly boy who was afraid of drowning."
*RING* I jump up and glance around me.
Everyone is leaving out of the classroom.
I gather all my things and head to lunch making sure not to bump into anyone.
"Glad one of us could go to dreamlandis, I for one would've given my right leg to sleep in Greek Ancient History," Nina says when I sit down with my salad.
"Meanwhile I would've done anything to get out," I say stabbing my fork into the shades of green, "Same dreams?"
Nina questions and I sigh.
Nina is my best friend and she would probably kill me, heal me, and kill me again if I said otherwise.
She's a healer, which got her quite the gig.
She works as the school's athletic trainer and she has a side hustle of healing people for money or favors.
She keeps it on the low of course since her mom is the school nurse.
Nina and I laughed, well she laughed
and I blew air out my nose, while sending each other funny videos, when he walks in.
Big and famous jock from the big and famous family, Andreas.
He's in his white and gold volleyball jersey and a pair of grey sweat pants.
A golden'1' printed on the back.
Damn him.
He and his friends sit in the middle of the cafeteria, chanting and boosting one another up about the game tonight.
"Are you-" Nina starts and I interrupt her "absolutely not."
She snorts at my usual answer, and at this point I think she asks if I'm going to school events to be funny.
"I figured" she says standing up and I follow her out.
Great --5th period with 'worlds best athlete' and his groupies.
This is sadly the only class Nina and I don't share.
I walk in and instantly wish I hadn't.
'Partner Project' is scribbled on the board in fresh chalk.
I take my usual seat in the back and watch as others pour into the room, all avoiding seats around me.
I would too I guess.
"Good morning class, let's hop right in!
Yes, there's a partner project, No you aren't choosing your own partner."
Ms. G states while slowly trotting around and giving everyone a rubric.
Ms. G, of course, is a centaur and the G stands for Galina but she says G does just fine.
"I will now announce the names for the group partners...
Ivy and Nova, Sophia and Cassian, Melody and Elara, Demitri and Troy," I no longer hear her voice as she continues, my 'partner' will more than likely want to work alone than with me.
"Lastly, Sea and Andreas" Ms. G claps and My eyes nearly pop out of my head.
The air in the room grows thick as Andreas brings his things over to where I'm settled in the back.
"We need you for the game tonight dre, don't die sitting next to that freak."
His teammate, Maliki, spits, peering at me.
I cower down into the desk further, trying to escape his gaze.
Andreas doesn't look up from his phone but I see him glance near me.
"I'm sure things will be fine as long as they don't touch each other" Elara chirps making everyone agree, turning around, but something seems off about Maliki.
He shakes his head as if he were coming out of a trance.
Too many volleyballs to the face.
"This project will help all of you to get to know one another!
You must spend some time with each other and write a paper telling what makes each other's abilities special."
Ms G says with a soft smile.
The project is due the 15th of November, meaning I have to spend...
A MONTH WITH HIM!?
Andreas looks at me whilst I throw a silent tantrum like a small child.
With one last toss of a piece of notebook paper, he speaks to me.
His expression-- well expressionless.
"Come to the game tonight, here's my number."
He slides a piece of torn paper to me and the bell sounds.
Everyone leaves.
I'm in awe for a second until I rewind what he said in my head..Come to the game.
Come to...the game.
Damnit Faster.
Run Faster.
Side to side on the court.
Blocking, Defending, Attacking.
Harder.
Hit the ball harder.
Fly into the air and hit the ball so hard it catches on fire, burning holes into the ground.
More.
Do more, play more.
Maybe if I do more I won't have to be hurt.
I won't have to be so--perfect.
Andreas
"LEO. LEO. LEO. LEO."
Our fans chant and cheer for us.
We're up by 12 but in the game of volleyball anything can happen and I must stay focused.
I stare holes into the opponents across from me.
Demitri is up to serve.
The crowd goes silent as he spins the ball in the palm of his hand.
The sound of his hand and the ball mimics a cracked whip as he sends a jump serve over the net.
The game is in motion.
Pass, set, hit.
The ball is recovered.
Demitri passes the ball to Andy, Andy sets to me and I fly into the air--sending the ball hurling through the gap of hands and smashing into the center of the court.
Leaving a mark.
The gym erupts into screams.
We continue this until we need the last two points to win.
Coach signals us to do the play 'flake'.
I serve the ball over, careful not to use all my strength, and put the game into play.
Pass, set, attack.
The ball is recovered by a dive from Royal.
Here we go.
Andy sets the ball and whole front row runs and jumps up swinging through to the left.
What they didn't pay attention to was the ball being set back to the right corner of the back row.
Cassian sends the ball over the net.
Everything is moving almost in slow motion.
The libero on the other side slowly connects the dots and dives for the ball--but he falls short.
The ball lands in the far corner of the court.
The team runs and picks cassian up as gold confetti pours down from the ceiling.
I forgot this was the last game.
Basketball here I come.
I turn to head to the locker room when I see him.
Head to toe in the same black as usual.
This makes him stand out from the color filled crowd in a way.
A single boat in the vast ocean.
I go to him.
Pushing past the team, moving through the crowd, throwing 'thank you' over my shoulder to people.
I jog up the stairs and stand near him.
"You came" I say and he emits a small smile.
"I figured everyone would save me a seat so" Sea jokes and I grin.
My Father walks up but stands a good distance away from Sea.
"Your Dad and I are headed back now.
Don't forget you start your new training tomorrow so don't be out any later than 2am."
He says in a cold voice and walks off.
Sea visibility shivers at his tone and hops up from where he's seated.
"Well, I should be starting home now," he says looking down at his shoes with his hands behind his back.
"Yeah me too, let me know when you want to start working on the project since you probably couldn't get much out of one game."
I say and he nods.
"Actually...are you busy at all tonight?"
I ask and he looks at me like I have three heads.
"I know a place where we can go and talk without people being so judgmental towards you," I continue and he looks kind on the fence about it.
"Don't worry about it too much, Just let me know okay."
I say and walk away to the locker rooms.
Sea "NOT A DATE WITH THE FAMOUS BOY FROM THE FAMOUS FAMILY!
I thought you hated him," Nina cackles at me and I grow frustrated.
"I asked you for help not jokes damnit, should I go or not, what if he kidnaps me!"
I stress, pulling at my hair.
"Did you forget you can't touch people and they can't touch you either?"
She says and I stare at her...
I forgot about that.
"Well then I'll go...and I do hate him, his perfect family, perfect life.
He's never once felt pain or been hurt.
He will never know what it's like to be alone.
I absolutely loathe him," I say and pick out a sweater.
I should switch it up right?
I go to the closet and shuffle through my clothes.
Black.
Black.
Black.
Black.
Ooo black and yellow let's shake it up a little.
My phone dings from my bed and Nina dives on top of it before I can get there.
"Your boy toy asked what time will you be ready?"
She snickers and I roll my eyes.
"Eight" I say and she texts him back and sends the address.
What have I gotten myself into?
Once upon a time, there was a story about a rock named Bellona.
She was the leader of the rocks.
She taught them how to fight against the monsters above, how to lead and trust no one but each other.
All the rocks respected her power and the way she moved with grace.
One day, Bellona was stolen from the water.
Big hands dipping down and pulling her from her kingdom.
Her and the monster battled back and forth but she was overpowered.
She was taken back with the monster and kept in their palace above.
Over time Bellona came to love the monster and they had a child.
Bellona took the child back to see her warriors and they were disgusted by her and her creation.
They beat her.
They cursed her and called her names.
They killed her for being a traitor, for being so 'weak.'
Her creation escaped and went back home to his father to tell him everything that happened.
His father went to the ocean and laid his hands into the water--throwing and breaking every rock in the chill of rushing blue and green.
Never again did the lives of rocks and humans collide.
Sea I open my eyes and sigh.
The water hits my ghostly pale skin, comforting me.
Giving me the hug I always longed for.
I get out and wrap my black towel around my waist.
Nina left awhile ago but not before taunting me further.
The clock on my dresser says 7:42.
I get dressed in my black skinny jeans and the black and yellow sweater I picked earlier.
By the time I dry and style my hair it's 8 and the door bell rings.
I pad down the steps and see Andreas talking with my father.
"Great game tonight son, you really have an arm on you!"
My dad says.
He's always been a big sports fan.
"I'm a big fan of your work as well, killing millions with a tap to the ground from your scythe."
He gawks, looking towards the impenetrable, one handed Scythe my dad has hanging on the wall.
I clear my throat and they look at me with surprised looks.
"Kiss already," I gag, rolling my eyes.
My dad scratches the back of his neck and gets up.
"Alright boys I'll see myself out.
Have him home in one piece Andreas.
If not...
well you know what I could do to you."
He says to him with a smile.
"I wouldn't have it any other way" Andreas says and we walk outside.
He presses a button and both the doors on his car go up.
Show off.
"Where are we going anyway."
I ask putting the seatbelt on.
"Only the best spot in town," He grins, pulling off.
Great.
Andreas
The drive isn't too far from where Sea lives so I don't try to make small talk.
My Apple Music softly plays 'See you again' by tyler, the creator, creating background noise.
I park the car and we get out.
I start walking and he shuffles behind me, kicking a few rocks and stepping on dead leaves.
We're coming up on the place I mentioned and Sea stops walking.
"Is that...water?"
He says becoming tense.
"Yeah, the water falls over the rocks on the other side of this tunnel."
I say and he visibly starts shaking.
"We don't have to go near the water--it's just somewhere I like to come and sit.
We could stay in the tunnel if you'd like."
I say and he still looks like I'm holding a sword to his throat.
"Take my han-" I start and I mentally slap myself when I remember.
I look around for something.
I see a small root coming from the ground and I rush to pull it up.
"Take the other end of this root," I say looking in his eyes, "There's absolutely no reason why I would or would want to hurt you in anyway possible."
I say gazing into his eyes.
He hesitates for a second.
There's no sound throughout the tunnel, only the endless down pour of the water, smoothing out the rocks.
He takes the other side.
I nod and force out the breath I didn't know I was holding.
We walk beside each other.
Slow, cautious footsteps until we step outside the tunnel and around the corner to the rocks.
We settle on a dry rock that shows a good view of the glowing water.
Sea is absolutely terrified.
"Tell me something about yourself," I say to distract him.
His eyes dart around, looking anywhere but the water.
"I'm seventeen," is all that falls out.
It's a start.
I continue short questions like 'what's your favorite color' and he finally calms down a bit.
"So you had to do your piercings on your own?"
I ask and he nods.
"They didn't hurt too bad, but the labret surely made me pass out afterwards."
He says and I cringe at the thought.
They do suit him though.
"I admire your strength."
I say and look out at the water.
"How come you play all these sports?
Do you ever take a break?"
He asks and I keep staring at the water.
I put down the root and turn to him.
"Can I open up to you about something?"
I ask him and he turns his head to the side.
"Why are you confused?"
I question.
"Well, I just figured your life was simple you know.
You work out, go to school, practice and play at your games.
The only pain you'd ever endure is if you scrape your knee or something.
What is there to open up about?"
He says and I'm at a loss for words.
"We're leaving."
Is all I can say before I get up and go back to my car.
"Doll we're going to be late for school, hurry out the bathroom!"
My mom says and I quickly untie the band from my arm.
I discard the needle in a sharps container and look at myself in the mirror.
My pupils are blown.
"let's go!"
Says mama which makes me jump out of my trance.
I heal my arm and leave out the bathroom.
Nina
